# Data manipulation
pandas==2.1.1          # For handling CSV and dataframes
numpy==1.26.2           # For numerical computations

# Plotting and visualization
matplotlib==3.8.1       # For plotting charts and histograms
seaborn==0.12.2         # For enhanced statistical plots
wordcloud==1.9.2        # For generating word clouds

# Natural Language Processing (NLP)
nltk==3.9.1             # For text preprocessing (stopwords, tokenization, lemmatization)
scikit-learn==1.3.1     # For ML models, preprocessing, and metrics

# Deep Learning
tensorflow==2.15.0      # For building LSTM and RNN models

# Model saving/loading
joblib==1.3.2           # For saving/loading ML models

# Optional for interactive display (used in your code for showing dataframes)
ace-tools-open==0.1.0
